location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Gulf of Persia, Bushire to Lieutenant-Colonel Edward Baker, Commissary General, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The edges of the folio have suffered from damage, and in consequence the date of the letter has been partially obscured.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a receipt (not present) for articles received from the Larkasarfor the use of the Bushire Residency.
